Title: Requires hospitals to provide certain information to patients who have suffered a traumatic brain injury
Summary: Requires hospitals to provide information on care and resources for brain injuries to patients who have suffered a traumatic brain injury and to also provide such information to a patient's family and/or caregivers.
LawCode: Add ยง2803-bb, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to requiring hospitals to provide certain information to patients who have suffered a traumatic brain injury
